articles.title: Asian Games 2023 Live Updates: Rain Stops, India-Malaysia Cricket QF May Restart Soon - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 Live Updates: After a rain delay, which has forced the match to be reduced to 15-overs-a-side contest, Shafali Verma and Jemimah Rodrigues are going great against Malaysia
